overview: Camille Fournier is currently serving as the Director of Infrastructure Engineering and Technical Architect for Rent the Runway. Prior to coming to Rent the Runway, she worked for Goldman Sachs as a Vice President in the areas of risk technology and technology infrastructure. She is also currently serving as a committer and project management committee member for the Apache ZooKeeper project. She has a BS in Computer Science from Carnegie Mellon University and a MS in Computer Science from the University of Wisconsin Madison.
